Cakes by Katie

Website for a local cake decorator to display her work and acquire new clients.

View website

Tell me more ...

I design, develop and maintain the website of a local cake decorator who uses the brand name Cakes by Katie. This website is Katie's primary method of acquiring customers and has played a significant role in making a quick success of a young business.

On arriving on the home page, users are greeted by an engaging full screen video to immediately display Katie's talents. The site structure includes a portfolio page, a page for each product and occasion, as well as other informational pages, making the site easy to navigate and maximises the site's search engine performance.

Obviously the primary goal of this website is to gain clients, and we regularly review Google analytics, Google Search Console, and Hotjar data to improve our customer acquistion. The website, which uses modern web image formats and scores well using Lighthouse, ranks well on search engines compared to similar competing businesses.
